# 8.0 Docs

- [Breaking change: ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance behaves consistently](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/activatorutilities-createinstance-behavior.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance behaves consistently regardless of the order of constructor overloads.
- [Breaking change: ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance requires non-null provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/activatorutilities-createinstance-null-provider.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance throws an ArgumentNullException if the provider is null.
- [Breaking change: System.Formats.Cbor DateTimeOffset formatting change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/cbor-datetime.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where System.Formats.Cbor always formats and parses DateTimeOffset values using the invariant culture.
- [Breaking change: ConfigurationBinder throws for mismatched value](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/configurationbinder-exceptions.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where ConfigurationBinder throws an exception if ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration is true and a config value doesn't match the model value.
- [Breaking change: ConfigurationManager package no longer references System.Security.Permissions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/configurationmanager-package.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where the System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager package no longer references the System.Security.Permissions package.
- [Breaking change: Empty keys added to dictionary by configuration binder](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/dictionary-configuration-binding.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where empty keys are now added to dictionary types by the configuration binder.
- [Breaking change: DirectoryServices package no longer references System.Security.Permissions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/directoryservices-package.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where the System.DirectoryServices package no longer references the System.Security.Permissions package.
- [Breaking change: ManagementDateTimeConverter.ToDateTime returns a local time](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/dmtf-todatetime.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where the DateTime returned by ManagementDateTimeConverter.ToDateTime is based on local time.
- [Breaking change: FromKeyedServicesAttribute.Key can be null](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/fromkeyedservicesattribute-key-nullable.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where FromKeyedServicesAttribute.Key is now nullable to support unkeyed services and inheritance.
- [Breaking change: HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args respected by HostApplicationBuilder ctor](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/8.0/hostapplicationbuilder-ctor.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where the HostApplicationBuilder constructor respects the HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args value even if DisableDefaults is true.
